summary: This bill, the "Guarding and Administering Trespass Enforcement, Controlling Restricted Areas, and Stopping High-risk Encroachment Recidivism and Sabotage Act" (GATE CRASHERS Act), amends Title 18 of the United States Code to establish criminal penalties for unauthorized access to Department of Defense facilities. It defines unauthorized access and sets escalating penalties for first, second, and subsequent offenses, including fines and imprisonment. The bill aims to deter trespassing on restricted military properties.
